member.summary: To be used when no custom facade is desired and WebApi for Read and Write both operations is required

member.name: M:BSPL.Web.ApiControllerAutoBase`2.#ctor(BSPL.Facades.IWritableFacade{`0,`1})
member.summary: Constructer for DI the facade

member.name: T:BSPL.Web.ApiControllerBase`3
member.summary: To be used when custom facade is desired and WebApi for Read and Write both operations is required

member.name: M:BSPL.Web.ApiControllerBase`3.Post(`2)
member.summary: Send model data via HttpPost to insert record in DB This method internally calls facade.Insert(model, LoggedInUser) One should override facade.Insert(model, LoggedInUser) if any custom behavior is desired while inserting e.g. Insert into other table post insert using newly created Id Or can override this method itself if using through ApiControllerAutoBase
member.param: Model to be inserted as Post payload
member.returns: Web Response with insertion result and inserted model with newly created id

member.name: M:BSPL.Web.ApiControllerBase`3.Put(System.Int64,`2)
member.summary: Send model data via HttpPut to Update record in DB with entity id in URL This method internally calls facade.Update(id, model, LoggedInUser) One should override facade.Update(id, model, LoggedInUser) if any custom behavior is desired while updating Or can override this method itself if using through ApiControllerAutoBase

member.name: M:BSPL.Web.ApiControllerBase`3.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Call this URL via HttpDelete method with entity id in URL for entity to be deleted This method internally calls facade.Delete(id) One should override facade.Delete(id) if any custom behavior is desired while deleting e.g. Cascade delete Or can override this method itself if using through ApiControllerAutoBase
member.param: Id of entity to be deleted
member.returns: Result of the action

member.name: M:BSPL.Web.ApiControllerBase`3.InternalPost(`2,BSPL.Facades.IWritableFacade{`1,`2})
member.summary: Override this method to interrupt and manipulate Insert Send model data via HttpPost to insert record in DB This method internally calls facade.Insert(model, LoggedInUser) One should override facade.Insert(model, LoggedInUser) if any custom behavior is desired while inserting e.g. Insert into other table post insert using newly created Id Or can override this method itself if using through ApiControllerAutoBase
member.param: Model to be inserted as Post payload
Facade on which crud operations are done
member.returns: Web Response with insertion result and inserted model with newly created id

member.name: M:BSPL.Web.ApiControllerBase`3.InternalPut(System.Int64,`2,BSPL.Facades.IWritableFacade{`1,`2})
member.summary: Override this method to interrupt and manipulate Update Send model data via HttpPut to Update record in DB with entity id in URL This method internally calls facade.Update(id, model, LoggedInUser) One should override facade.Update(id, model, LoggedInUser) if any custom behavior is desired while updating Or can override this method itself if using through ApiControllerAutoBase
member.param: Facade on which crud operations are done
member.returns: Web Response with updated result

member.name: M:BSPL.Web.ApiControllerBase`3.InternalDelete(System.Int32,BSPL.Facades.IWritableFacade{`1,`2})
member.summary: Override this method to interrupt and manipulate Delete Call this URL via HttpDelete method with entity id in URL for entity to be deleted This method internally calls facade.Delete(id) One should override facade.Delete(id) if any custom behavior is desired while deleting e.g. Cascade delete Or can override this method itself if using through ApiControllerAutoBase
member.param: Id of entity to be deleted
Facade on which crud operations are done
member.returns: Result of the action

member.summary: Please override and return false if full listing is not desired

member.name: M:BSPL.Web.ApiControllerReadOnlyBase`3.Get
member.summary: Get list of all entities after prefilters if any and pagination rules Calls facade.ListChronologicalPage(pageSize, pageNumber, sortBy=null, params preFilters) or facade.ListAll(preFilters) or facade.ListAll() depending on parameters For pagination parameters should be provided by http headers named "pageSize", "pageNumber" and "sortBy" (optional, for sorting) alternatively or for testing these parameters can be passed as query string
member.returns: Entity list

member.name: M:BSPL.Web.ApiControllerReadOnlyBase`3.Get(System.Int64)
member.summary: Get specific entity/model for given Id (provided in url)
member.param: Id of entity/model to be returned

member.summary: Use this method will return all records after filtering by field equating to value as number

member.summary: Use this method will return all records after filtering by field equating to value as string

member.summary: Use this method will return all records after filtering by field equating to value as date

member.name: M:BSPL.Web.ApiControllerReadOnlyBase`3.GetSearchBy(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use this method will return all records after keyword (contains) search on given field by keyword

member.summary: Use this method will return name value records as list all

member.summary: Use this method will return name value records, mainly to do lookup or select records after filtering by field equating to value as string

member.name: T:BSPL.Web.JsGridBuilder`1
member.summary: @(Html.JsGridBuilder<XYZModel>().Sorting().ApiUrl("/Api/XYZs").Dropdown("SomeID","/Api/Masters/name/id").Render())
member.typeparam: Type of XYZModel for which grid is required

member.name: M:BSPL.Web.JsGridBuilder`1.Dropdown(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Specifying field with DropDownList
member.param: Field to which dropdown is required to attached
Optional, Web Api URL to fetch options else wil be taken as "/api/{Title}s/name/id" or options in json e.g. { 'M': 'Male', 'F': 'Female' }
Optional, default false, if column to be hided fromm grid or not
Optional, if its dependent of any other field
